p: The overall sugar content was evaluated through the calibration curve of standard glucose by the phenol-sulfuric acid method ( Dubois et al., 1956). The carbazole method ( Karamanos et al., 1988) is used to determine the uronic acid by galacturonic as the reference compound. The Bradford protein assay measures protein content by using standard BSA ( Li and Shah, 2016). Entire measurements were done in three-fold.
